[temit](./temit.md) &gt; [RequesterOptions](./temit.requesteroptions.md)

## RequesterOptions interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RequesterOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [priority](./temit.requesteroptions.priority.md) | [Priority](./temit.priority.md) | Sets the priority of the message. Higher priority messages will be routed to consumers before lower priority messages, regardless of queue position.<!-- -->Can be a numeric value from 1 to 10. |
|  [timeout](./temit.requesteroptions.timeout.md) | string &#124; number | Set the length of time before the request times out and returns an error.<!-- -->Allows time strings as per the <code>ms</code> package, such as <code>&quot;30 seconds&quot;</code> or <code>&quot;50ms&quot;</code>.<!-- -->A timeout can be entirely disabled by setting this option to <code>0</code>. This is not recommened.<!-- -->The default (and recommendation) is 30 seconds. |
